title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. V, pt. 72 - Layoff Units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. V, pt. 72 - Layoff Units

State Regulations
§ 72.1 - Separate units for suspension, demotion or displacement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. V, pt. 72

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §§ 80[4], [5], 80-a[3], [4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
